name: the-shortest-url-amcywe
description: URL shortening service using Node and any framework.

scripts.test: rm -rf dist && tsc && set NODE_ENV=test && jest --env=node --no-cache -i --detectOpenHandles --coverage --forceExit ./dist/test
scripts.test-windows: rm -rf dist & tsc & set NODE_ENV=test & jest --env=node --no-cache -i --detectOpenHandles --coverage --forceExit ./dist/test

author: will-abule <willxd42@gmail.com>
